constituent: drip, water, water droplets, water pistol, antique, vase, stand up, hood, old, tombstone, gravestone, church, ten, needle, mouth
heisigStory: Picture water dripping on what you thought were precious antiques, only to find that the artificial aging painted on them is running!
koohiiStory1: DRIPS of WATER were collected in ANTIQUE VASES since the museum had a leaky roof.
koohiiStory2: You must never let water drip onto antiques.
myStory: nhỏ giọt. chương phần nước dùng để nhỏ giọt. đứng nhỏ giọt nước đến già
readingExamples: 滴 (しずく), 滴る (したた.る)
words: 水滴(すいてき): drop of water
